bug.author: vfdev-5
bug.summary: [UI] file view does not keep tabs
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Currently in "Output" tab, when viewing output files, e.g. python files the tabs/spaces inside the files are not rendered. For example, the following text def foo(): pass will be displayed as def foo(): pass <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Polyaxon : 0.4.4

comments.comment: We will provide proper editors for all code extensions similar to the config/dockerfile editors.

The outputs tabs has been improved significantly, and all files are now rendered properly using a code editor with language detection, images and other medias are using proper html tags. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/polyaxon/polyaxon/issues/417>#417</denchmark-link> for some example screenshots.
